Task #597: Delete deprecated server classes and tests

timeline.bodyText: This is a bit strange. If we dont need the setup from the super class, then we are we extending AServerRepositoryTest?
timeline.author: SaMuellerDLR

replies.bodyText: You are right that is strange. I looked into it and it called the setUp() from the AGitAndJettyServerTest, that AServerRepositoryTest extends, that I deleted in this PR. The problem causing this misunderstanding was wrong naming of the   junit setup/teardown methods in AServerRepositoryTest, so I will rename them to make it clear.
replies.author: JAmmermann-DLR
